Tests that console can filter console.group() messages correctly.


Filter set to: /message-a1/
>console-filter-groups.js:11 Outer group-A
  console-filter-groups.js:12 message-a1

Filter set to: /message-b1/
>console-filter-groups.js:11 Outer group-A
  >console-filter-groups.js:15 Inner group-B
    console-filter-groups.js:16 message-b1

Filter set to: /message-d1/
>console-filter-groups.js:11 Outer group-A
  >console-filter-groups.js:25 Collapsed inner group-D

Filter set to: /message-e1/
>console-filter-groups.js:11 Outer group-A
  >console-filter-groups.js:25 Collapsed inner group-D

Filter set to: /message-f1/
>console-filter-groups.js:37 Collapsed outer group-F

Filter set to: /message-z1/
console-filter-groups.js:45 message-z1

Filter set to: /message-a1|message-b1/
>console-filter-groups.js:11 Outer group-A
  console-filter-groups.js:12 message-a1
  >console-filter-groups.js:15 Inner group-B
    console-filter-groups.js:16 message-b1

Filter set to: /message-a1|message-d1/
>console-filter-groups.js:11 Outer group-A
  console-filter-groups.js:12 message-a1
  >console-filter-groups.js:25 Collapsed inner group-D

Filter set to: /message-a1|message-e1/
>console-filter-groups.js:11 Outer group-A
  console-filter-groups.js:12 message-a1
  >console-filter-groups.js:25 Collapsed inner group-D

Filter set to: /message-a1|message-z1/
>console-filter-groups.js:11 Outer group-A
  console-filter-groups.js:12 message-a1
console-filter-groups.js:45 message-z1

Filter set to: /message-b1|message-c1/
>console-filter-groups.js:11 Outer group-A
  >console-filter-groups.js:15 Inner group-B
    console-filter-groups.js:16 message-b1
  >console-filter-groups.js:20 Inner group-C
    console-filter-groups.js:21 message-c1

  >console-filter-groups.js:15 Inner group-B
    console-filter-groups.js:16 message-b1
  >console-filter-groups.js:25 Collapsed inner group-D

Filter cleared
